title: Channel24.co.za | CeeLo Green is engaged
text:
Los Angeles - CeeLo Green has got engaged. 
The 41-year-old rapper is set to tie the knot with his long-time lover Shani James, 38, after he secretly popped the question over a year ago while finishing up at the studio. 
Speaking to PEOPLE.com, he said: "It was just a typical night at the studio, but then again, not so typical cause I did something extra special, out of the ordinary. 
"I went and purchased a ring that we had seen together, maybe four or five months or so prior. 
"I went back and purchased the ring and I just kind of had it stashed away in some old equipment. And I said, 'Will you reach in there and grab something for me?'" 
The couple - who are known for being notoriously tight-lipped on their private life - haven't shared their happy news until now because they want to keep their romance "sacred". 
He explained: "Truth be told, it's not something we wanted to promote. We're a collective power together because our private life is sacred. 
"But you know what though, maybe it's time. Maybe it is time for the world to know that I have a very secure situation and a loving woman supporting me the entire way." 
Although the loved-up duo haven't started planning their nuptials as of yet, the Forget You hitmaker is keen to be "spontaneous" when it comes to getting hitched in the future. 
He added with a smile: "I'm a pretty hands on person. We'll be prepared to be spontaneous." 
Meanwhile, this isn't the first time CeeLo - whose real name is Thomas DeCarlo Callaway - has popped the question as he was previously married to Christina Johnson for five years until they divorced in 2005. Read more on: ceelo green | celebrities NEXT ON CHANNEL24 X
